metadata.title: CVE-2022-1116 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - high
metadata.description:
Integer Overflow or Wraparound vulnerability in io_uring of Linux Kernelallows local attacker to cause memory corruption and escalate privileges toroot. This issue affects: Linux Kernel versions prior to 5.4.189; version5.4.24 and later versions.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-1116` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1008-aws - 6.8.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1007-azure - 6.8.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1007-gcp - 6.8.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-31-lowlatency - 6.8.0-31.31.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-31-lowlatency-64k - 6.8.0-31.31.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1005-oracle - 6.8.0-1005.5
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1005-oracle-64k - 6.8.0-1005.5
No subscription required

linux-image-6.8.0-1004-raspi - 6.8.0-1004.4
No subscription required
